A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The character developments in the previous film were left by the wayside in this one. The \"cheese\" factor surpasses Phantom Menace at certain points. The movie is visually stunning\, but in a sea of overproduced cgi flicks\, it doesn't stand out. It lacks grit\, soul\, and emotion\, a vacuous cash grab. It's truly the end of an era\, the saga is officially dead\, time for some new fresh original sci-fi from young up and coming directors.
